A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved it! It not only gave us something new to look forward to\, it also forced Abrams in a postition to keep going with the new stuff and not create another OT remake because idk about y'all but I saw elements of Empire Strikes Back and Return of The Jedi in this! I'm excited to see where Star Wars is going and it hurts me that so many people try to trash talk this film. It was great\, and can not wait to see what else the galaxy far far away is going to bring me!
